_note: Axis definitions for persona, jobs-to-be-done, and conversion style. Authoritative source for AI agents when generating landing variants.
_agentGuidelines: Pick exactly one variant per axis when proposing a new landing page.
Use the descriptions + example copy to keep tone consistent with the selected combination.
Avoid disallowed combinations unless the constraints file is explicitly updated.

persona._note: Primary buyer persona that the copy should target.

variants.label: Silent Founder
variants.description: Introverted solo builders who want to ship without meetings or sales calls.

examples.headline: Build a business without talking to anyone
examples.tagline: Agents and automations handle the business work while you build.

agentHints: Lead with no-meetings, no per-seat pricing, and async everything.
Promise future tools arrive automatically with the same subscription.

variants.label: Solo Developer
variants.description: Independent engineers who want tests + automation + marketing in one flow.
agentHints: Emphasize e2e tests as replays and CI hooks.
Highlight shipping proof without hiring marketers.

variants.label: QA Engineer
variants.description: Quality owners who want visual tests and replayable failures.
agentHints: Lean on stability, CI integration, and visual failure proof.
Call out that workflows double as tests.

variants.label: Automation Engineer
agentHints: Focus on visual workflow authoring and scheduling.
Promise future agent loops that self-heal flows.

variants.label: Agency
variants.description: Studios delivering client work with branded replays and handoffs.
agentHints: Include MP4 exports, branding, and client-safe deliverables.

jtbd._note: Jobs-to-be-done that the visitor expects to accomplish.

variants.label: Automate back office
variants.description: Replace manual browser work with reusable workflows.
agentHints: Show before/after for admin panels and dashboards.

variants.label: End-to-end testing
variants.description: Use workflows as tests with replayable failures and CI hooks.
agentHints: Mention CI integration and visual failure playback.

variants.label: Build a business
variants.description: Launch and market products quietly with automation + replay assets.
agentHints: Promise future suite tools; keep CTAs self-serve.

variants.label: Marketing demos
variants.description: Generate beautiful replay videos for campaigns and onboarding.
agentHints: Highlight MP4 exports, fake browser frames, cursor motion.

conversionStyle._note: Conversion motion emphasized on the page.

variants.label: Emotional relief
variants.description: Lead with anxiety relief, no meetings, and quiet independence.
agentHints: Use calm, confident tone; spotlight "no sales calls".

variants.label: Technical proof
variants.description: Lead with architecture, CI hooks, and reliability.
agentHints: Include diagrams and CI examples where possible.

variants.label: Future-of-work vision
variants.description: Sell the suite that keeps getting smarter over time.
agentHints: Talk about agent loops and compound intelligence.

constraints._note: Prevent odd pairings that dilute the narrative.
